document_data.name: ''Drums of Thunder''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Drums of thunder''''' were a pair of magical [[drum]]s from the land of [[Kara-Tur]] that could produce a variety of different effects.{{ Cite book/Oriental Adventures|134}}
document_data.Description: These drums were rather small and adorned with tassels. They were also fitted with a harness, allowing the drummer to fasten them to their waist.
document_data.Powers: When played, ''drums of thunder'' could produce any of the following effects, though only one at a time, which each required charges: allow the drummer to ''[[fly]]'' for ten minutes (one charge), cast ''[[cloud trapeze]]'' for ten minutes (three charges), cast ''[[control weather]]'' (one charge), unleash various ''[[lightning bolt]]s'' (five charges), or produce an effect similar to ''[[drums of panic]]'' (two charges).
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Ayana No-Shui]], a powerful [[wu-jen]].<ref>
* The [[Temple of Kuan Yi]] had a set of ''drums of thunder'' displayed before their shrine to the god [[Kuan Di]].<ref>
